sentences.sContent: I hereby do asseverate my solemn belief that globalization, taken as a whole, is a positive economic force and well worth defending.
sentences.sContent_eng: I hereby do asseverate my solemn belief that globalization, taken as a whole, is a positive economic force and well worth defending.
sentences.sCn: 在此我郑重声明我的神圣信仰国际化，总体上是一种积极地经济力量，十分值得卫护。

synos.tran: 郑重声明；（严正地）宣称；断言

trans.tranOther: to assert or declare emphatically or solemnly
